com.gunnarhoffman.converters

Class TemperatureConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gunnarhoffman.converters.TemperatureConverter

  • public class TemperatureConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aids in conversion between various forms of measuring temperature. The units this class handles are Kelvin, Celsius, and Fahrenheit.
    Author:
    Blake Hair
